LanguageData.GunComplex.label: GunComplex
LanguageData.GunComplex.description: Allows the production of the new non AI controlled gun complex for your colony defense.
LanguageData.RocketComplex.label: gun complex
LanguageData.RocketComplex.description: Allows the production of the non AI controlled rocket complex for your colony defense.
LanguageData.MilitaryTurret.label: military grade turrets
LanguageData.MilitaryTurret.description: Allows the production of more advanced military grade turrets.
LanguageData.ShredderTurret.label: shredder turrets
LanguageData.ShredderTurret.description: Allows the production of deadly close range Shredders turrets.
LanguageData.PrecisionTurret.label: precision turrets
LanguageData.PrecisionTurret.description: Allows the production of long range Precision turrets.
LanguageData.BlastTurret.label: blast turrets
LanguageData.BlastTurret.description: Allows the production of quite fearful Blast turrets.
LanguageData.VulcanCannon.label: vulcan cannon
LanguageData.VulcanCannon.description: Allows the production of Vulcan cannons.
LanguageData.DevastatorMortar.label: devastator mortar
LanguageData.DevastatorMortar.description: Allows the production of Devastator mortars.
